name: No-Clip
description: Toggleable no-clip: skip death checks to pass through objects. Includes in-game toggle and keybind.

noclipEnabled.name: Enable No-Clip
noclipEnabled.description: When enabled, death is skipped so you can pass through obstacles.

toggleKey.name: Toggle Key(s)
toggleKey.description: Key(s) to toggle no-clip on/off in a level. For multiple keys, separate with commas (e.g. 'A,Space').
